Sentencas: Short-term tests showing the influence sulfur has on solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) performance have been performed.
Titulo: Experimental studies on the influence of H2S on solid oxide fuel cell performance at 800 °C

Sentencas: The experiments were performed using two single-cell SOFC setups operated at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Experimental studies on the influence of H2S on solid oxide fuel cell performance at 800 °C

Sentencas: In setup I, sulfur (H2S) was mixed into the fuel gas in concentrations ranging from 20 to 100 ppm.
Titulo: Experimental studies on the influence of H2S on solid oxide fuel cell performance at 800 °C

Sentencas: It was found that the performance decreased with increasing sulfur concentration up to 80 ppm.
Titulo: Experimental studies on the influence of H2S on solid oxide fuel cell performance at 800 °C

Sentencas: The performance loss at 80 and 100 ppm sulfur was equal.
Titulo: Experimental studies on the influence of H2S on solid oxide fuel cell performance at 800 °C

Sentencas: At a current density of 200 mA cm(-2), the operating voltage was reduced from 0.810 V at 0 ppm H2S to 0.790 V at 100 ppm H2S, corresponding to an increase in the area-specific cell resistivity (ASR) of 0.10 Omega cm(2).
Titulo: Experimental studies on the influence of H2S on solid oxide fuel cell performance at 800 °C

Sentencas: In setup II, sulfur levels of 80, 120, and 240 ppm were introduced.
Titulo: Experimental studies on the influence of H2S on solid oxide fuel cell performance at 800 °C

Sentencas: In all these three cases the ASR increased by around 0.13 Omega cm(2).
Titulo: Experimental studies on the influence of H2S on solid oxide fuel cell performance at 800 °C

Sentencas: Removing the sulfur impurity when the 240 ppm H2S exposure test was finished the cell performance fully recovered, indicating no irreversible changes in the cell structure.
Titulo: Experimental studies on the influence of H2S on solid oxide fuel cell performance at 800 °C
